Newsletter Section with Image.Layout: Divided layout with an image on the left and a sign-up form on the right.
Newsletter Section with Image.Design: Clean and modern, with a focus on encouraging users to subscribe to a newsletter. The image enhances visual appeal while the form engages the user.

Key Elements.Image: Left-aligned, high-quality image that takes up half the screen width on larger devices.
Key Elements.Headline: Bold, centered or left-aligned, emphasizing the subscription call-to-action.
Key Elements.Description: Short text below the headline, encouraging users to sign up.
Key Elements.Form: Includes an email input field and a prominent 'Send' button.
Key Elements.Legal Text: Disclaimer about terms of service and privacy policy with links, positioned below the form.

Newsletter Section with Image.Use Cases: Ideal for blogs, media sites, and businesses aiming to grow their email subscriber list.
